Name: Miracle Fly
About the game: FEATURES - Control is unique, which means it would give you a whole new gaming experience (you might find it hard to play at first, but don't worry, you'll get used to it) *You can use keyboard ( W / S button as replacement for mouse click) - 100+ stages. Almost every stage has unique design. - Spice up your game experience by fighting the (cute) boss - Play with other characters in New Game+. Access it after you finish the game with equal amount of character used. There is no story in Miracle Fly. The characters are just having fun in the Dream World.
